item.title: Create a proxy server with Pfsense and Squid
item.description: In this note, we will see how to install a proxy server, using Pfsense and Squid. We will use virtual machines, created under Vmware. Topology of our network Here is the network topology that we will use in this tutorial: To access the Internet, the “Linux” PC will go through the “Pfsense” router, in order to leave the local network “LAN”. Here the subtlety is that if “Linux” wants to access some web pages, these requests will first go through our proxy server “Squid”.
